text: Then I will pour out on the house of David and on the people of Jerusalem a spirit 12:10 Or the Spirit of grace and prayer, and they will look on Me,12:10 Or to Me the One they have pierced.12:10 Cited in John 19:37 They will mourn for Him as one mourns for an only child, and grieve bitterly for Him as one grieves for a firstborn son.
